verbose_text: In conclusion, the results of the present study demonstrate that FGF-2 facilitates hPDLC proliferation in the absence and presence of osteogenic inducers, while modulating the balance between their osteoblastic and fibroblastic phenotypes by affecting the gene expression of Runx2, OCN, Col1a1 and EGFR in the absence of ostoegenic inducers, in addition to inhibiting the mineralization of hPDLCs in the presence of osteogenic inducers.
evidence: expression of Runx2, OCN, Col1a1 and EGFR
